source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'TGR % param %'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT DISTINCT VERSION_NAME, FUND_ID, ASSET_ID
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0

SELECT VERSION_NAME, COUNT(*) AS TO_PROCESS
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0
GROUP BY VERSION_NAME

SELECT VERSION_NAME, COUNT(*) AS TO_PROCESS
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0
GROUP BY VERSION_NAME

SELECT CASE WHEN OFFSET_ERROR IS NULL THEN '' ELSE OFFSET_ERROR END AS OFFSET_ERROR FROM (
SELECT 
stuff( (SELECT ', '+CONCAT(FAR.Fund_ID,'  ',FAR.Asset_ID,'  ',FAR.Version_name,
'  Asset-Ref-Asset-Offset: ',FAR.Asset_Offset,'  Parameter-Asset-Offset: ',FCP.Asset_offset)
FROM relational.Forecast_Asset_reference FAR
JOIN staging.Forecast_Param FCP
ON FAR.Fund_ID = FCP.Fund_ID AND FAR.Asset_ID = FCP.Asset_ID 
AND FAR.Version_name = FCP.Version_name
WHERE FAR.Asset_Offset < CAST(FCP.Asset_offset AS INT) 
AND FAR.record_deleted_flag = 0 AND FAR.IsProcessed = 0
ORDER BY FAR.Version_name
FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') AS OFFSET_ERROR
)x

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	process_name as string,
	ETL_local as string,
	useremail as string
}
source(output(
		View_Name as string,
		Category_Index as integer,
		Category as string,
		Sub_Category_Index as integer,
		Sub_Category as string,
		Item_Index as integer,
		Item as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MappingText
AuditFields alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
MappingText derive(Update_Time = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Process_Name = $process_name,
		UserEmail = $useremail) ~> AuditFields
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		View_Name as string,
		Category as string,
		process_name as string,
		Sub_Category as string,
		Item as string,
		Category_Index as integer,
		Sub_Category_Index as integer,
		Item_Index as integer,
		CF_Code as string,
		CF_Description as string,
		CPM_Code as string,
		CPM_Description as string,
		update_datetime as timestamp,
		update_user as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['View_Name','GL_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	postSQLs:['UPDATE relational.COA_Views\nSET CPM_Code = COA.Reporting_5, GL_Desc = COA.GL_Desc\n\nFROM\n\nrelational.Chart_of_Account COA JOIN relational.COA_Views v on COA.GL_Code = v.GL_Code\n\nWHERE COA.record_deleted_flag = 0'],
	mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		View_Name,
		Category,
		process_name = Process_Name,
		Sub_Category,
		Item,
		Category_Index,
		Sub_Category_Index,
		Item_Index,
		update_datetime = Update_Time,
		update_user = UserEmail
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> COAViews

properties.description: sums four columns from Estate sheet for each TM model

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Version as string,
		Fund as string,
		Asset as string,
		Period as string,
		PlunitID as string,
		Plunit as string,
		OriginID as string,
		Origin as string,
		SpeciesID as string,
		Species as string,
		PerpetualArea as string,
		CurrentArea as string,
		FutureArea as string,
		Disposed as string,
		Acquired as string,
		PerpetualFinalFell as string,
		CurrentFinalFell as string,
		FutureFinalFell as string,
		PerpetualLand as string,
		CurrentLand as string,
		FutureLand as string,
		PerpetualRental as string,
		CurrentRental as string,
		FutureRental as string,
		PerpetualOverhead as string,
		CurrentOverhead as string,
		FutureOverhead as string,
		PerpetualRates as string,
		CurrentRates as string,
		FutureRates as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ForestModel
ForestModel select(mapColumn(
		Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		Period,
		PerpetualArea,
		PerpetualFinalFell,
		PerpetualLand,
		PerpetualRental,
		PerpetualOverhead,
		PerpetualRates
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ForestModelColumns
NumericValues aggregate(groupBy(Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		Period),
	PerpetualArea = sum(PerpetualArea),
		PerpetualFinalFell = sum(PerpetualFinalFell),
		PerpetualLand = sum(PerpetualLand),
		PerpetualRental = sum(PerpetualRental),
		PerpetualOverhead = sum(PerpetualOverhead),
		PerpetualRates = sum(PerpetualRates)) ~> ColumnSums
Unpivot1 derive(Status = 'Estate_Calcs') ~> AddStatus
ForestModelColumns derive(PerpetualArea = toDouble(PerpetualArea),
		PerpetualFinalFell = toDouble(PerpetualFinalFell),
		PerpetualLand = toDouble(PerpetualLand),
		PerpetualRental = toDouble(PerpetualRental),
		PerpetualOverhead = toDouble(PerpetualOverhead),
		PerpetualRates = toDouble(PerpetualRates)) ~> NumericValues
ColumnSums unpivot(output(
		Product as string,
		Perpetual as double
	),
	ungroupBy(Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		Period),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> Unpivot1
AddStatus sink(input(
		Period as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		Perpetual_Amount as string,
		Curent_Amount as string,
		Future_Amount as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Version_name as string,
		UOM as string,
		Share_Perpetual as string,
		Entity as string,
		Destination as string,
		Category as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Period,
		Status,
		Product,
		Perpetual_Amount = Perpetual,
		Fund_ID = Fund,
		Asset_ID = Asset,
		Version_name = Version
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DBStaging

parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		{Source Metric} as string,
		{Source Name} as string,
		{Source Type} as string,
		{Source Link} as string,
		{Source Data Type} as string,
		{Data Process Type} as string,
		{Source Status} as string,
		Frequency as string,
		{Confidence Level} as string,
		{Person Responsible} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		Metric_Short_Name as string,
		Source_Name as string,
		Source_Type as string,
		Source_Link as string,
		Source_Data_Type as string,
		Data_Process_Type as string,
		Source_Status as string,
		Frequency as string,
		Confidence_Level as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Insert_DateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT\n       [Metric_Short_Name]\n      ,[Source_Name]\n      ,[Source_Type]\n      ,[Source_Link]\n      ,[Source_Data_Type]\n      ,[Data_Process_Type]\n      ,[Source_Status]\n      ,[Frequency]\n      ,[Confidence_Level]\n      ,[Person_Responsible]\n      ,[Insert_DateTime]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Data_Source]\nWHERE Data_Source_Id != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimDataSourceLkp
DatamartDimDataSourceLkp select(mapColumn(
		Metric_Short_Name_Lkp = Metric_Short_Name,
		Source_Name_Lkp = Source_Name,
		Source_Type_Lkp = Source_Type,
		Source_Link_Lkp = Source_Link,
		Source_Data_Type_Lkp = Source_Data_Type,
		Data_Process_Type_Lkp = Data_Process_Type,
		Source_Status_Lkp = Source_Status,
		Frequency_Lkp = Frequency,
		Confidence_Level_Lkp = Confidence_Level,
		Person_Responsible_Lkp = Person_Responsible,
		Insert_DateTime_Lkp = Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimDataSourceLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName) ~> DataTransformation
RemoveDuplicate, SelectDimDataSourceLkp lookup({Source Metric} == Metric_Short_Name_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckDimensionRecordExist
GetNewOrModified derive(InsertUpdateFlag = iif(isNull(Metric_Short_Name_Lkp), "I", "U"),
		Insert_DateTime = iif(isNull(Metric_Short_Name_Lkp), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'), Insert_DateTime_Lkp),
		Update_DateTime = iif(isNull(Metric_Short_Name_Lkp), toTimestamp(""), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'))) ~> AddAdditionalAudit
AddAdditionalAudit alterRow(insertIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"I")),
	updateIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"U"))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdate
DataTransformation split(not(isNull({Source Metric})),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckInputRecord@(Valid, Invalid)
RemoveBlankRow derive(Error_Desc = toString("Source Metric cannot be empty"),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> AddErrorDetail
CheckInputRecord@Invalid filter(not(isNull({Source Metric})) || not(isNull({Source Name})) || not(isNull({Source Type})) || not(isNull({Source Link})) || 
not(isNull({Source Data Type})) || not(isNull({Data Process Type})) || not(isNull({Source Status})) || not(isNull(Frequency)) || 
not(isNull({Confidence Level})) || not(isNull({Person Responsible}))) ~> RemoveBlankRow
CheckDimensionRecordExist filter(isNull(Metric_Short_Name_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Source Name}, Source_Name_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Source Type}, Source_Type_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Source Link}, Source_Link_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Source Data Type}, Source_Data_Type_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Data Process Type}, Data_Process_Type_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Source Status}, Source_Status_Lkp) || 
notEquals(Frequency, Frequency_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Confidence Level}, Confidence_Level_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Person Responsible}, Person_Responsible_Lkp)) ~> GetNewOrModified
ReplaceNullToUndefined aggregate(groupBy({Source Metric},
		{Source Name},
		{Source Type},
		{Source Link},
		{Source Data Type},
		{Data Process Type},
		{Source Status},
		Frequency,
		{Confidence Level},
		{Person Responsible},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name),
	DuplicateCount = count()) ~> RemoveDuplicate
CheckInputRecord@Valid derive({Source Name} = iifNull({Source Name}, "Undefined"),
		{Source Type} = iifNull({Source Type}, "Undefined"),
		{Source Link} = iifNull({Source Link}, "Undefined"),
		{Source Data Type} = iifNull({Source Data Type}, "Undefined"),
		{Data Process Type} = iifNull({Data Process Type}, "Undefined"),
		{Source Status} = iifNull({Source Status}, "Undefined"),
		Frequency = iifNull(Frequency, "Undefined"),
		{Confidence Level} = iifNull({Confidence Level}, "Undefined"),
		{Person Responsible} = iifNull({Person Responsible}, "Undefined")) ~> ReplaceNullToUndefined
AlterRowInsertUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Metric_Short_Name'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Metric_Short_Name = {Source Metric},
		Source_Name = {Source Name},
		Source_Type = {Source Type},
		Source_Link = {Source Link},
		Source_Data_Type = {Source Data Type},
		Data_Process_Type = {Data Process Type},
		Source_Status = {Source Status},
		Frequency,
		Confidence_Level = {Confidence Level},
		Person_Responsible = {Person Responsible},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime,
		Update_DateTime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetDim
AddErrorDetail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Metric_Short_Name = {Source Metric},
		Source_Name = {Source Name},
		Source_Type = {Source Type},
		Source_Link = {Source Link},
		Source_Data_Type = {Source Data Type},
		Data_Process_Type = {Data Process Type},
		Source_Status = {Source Status},
		Frequency,
		Confidence_Level = {Confidence Level},
		Person_Responsible = {Person Responsible},
		Source_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc,
		Insert_Datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT TRX.[Trx_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Code]\n      ,TRX.[Fund_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Asset_ID]\n      ,TRX.[GL_Code]\n      ,CASE WHEN COA.GL_Code IS NOT NULL THEN COA.[Cash_Flow_Code] ELSE TRX.Cash_Flow_Code END AS Cash_Flow_Code\n      ,TRX.[Debit_Credit]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Type]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Date]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Desc]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Amount]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions] TRX\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Chart_of_Account] COA\n  ON TRX.GL_Code = COA.GL_Code AND COA.record_deleted_flag = 0\n  WHERE TRX.[record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND DATEDIFF(DAY,TRX.Update_datetime,CONVERT(smalldatetime,CONVERT(datetimeoffset, SYSDATETIME()) AT TIME ZONE \'AUS Eastern Standard Time\')) <= 365',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Trx_Code]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Trx_Type]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND [Trx_Type] = \'Actual\'\n  AND [Trx_Desc] = \'Beginning Balance:\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDBbeginningbalanceonly
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(StagingChecksum == Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Trx_ID = Trx_ID,
		Relation_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_Debit_Credit = Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		Relation_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		Relation_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc,
		Relation_Trx_Amount = Trx_Amount,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@TrxCodeNotBeginningBalance select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow, SelectBeginingBalanceColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionNewTransactions

		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutput

		RelationBB_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		RelationBB_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Version_Name as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as decimal(18,2),
		Budget_Type as string,
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Version_Name as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Type as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT REL.[Version_Name]\n      ,REL.[Fund_ID]\n      ,REL.[Asset_ID]\n      ,REL.[GL_Code]\n      ,REL.[Cash_Flow_Code]\n      ,REL.[Debit_Credit]\n      ,REL.[Budget_Type]\n      ,REL.[Budget_Date]\n      ,REL.[Budget_Desc]\n      ,REL.[Budget_value]\n      ,REL.[Update_datetime]\n      ,REL.[record_deleted_flag]\n      ,REL.[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Budgets] REL\n  JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT VERSION_NAME FROM [staging].[COA_Budgets]) STG\n  ON REL.Version_Name = STG.Version_Name\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Budget_Date,Budget_Type,Version_Name)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(StagingChecksum == Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Budget_Date,Budget_Type,Version_Name)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	Debit_Credit!=Relation_Debit_Credit || Budget_value!=Relation_Budget_value || Budget_Desc!=Relation_Budget_Desc,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Version_Name = Version_Name,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_Debit_Credit = Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Budget_Type = Budget_Type,
		Relation_Budget_Date = Budget_Date,
		Relation_Budget_Desc = Budget_Desc,
		Relation_Budget_value = Budget_value,
		Relation_Update_datetime = Update_datetime,
		Relation_record_deleted_flag = record_deleted_flag,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Version_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-',$ProcessName,$FileName),
		insert_update_flag = toString('I')) ~> AddAuditColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-', $ProcessName, $FileName),
		insert_update_flag = toString('I')) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1),
		insert_update_flag = toString('U')) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag,
		Version_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		GL_Code = Relation_GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Relation_Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit = Relation_Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Type = Relation_Budget_Type,
		Budget_Date = Relation_Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc = Relation_Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value = Relation_Budget_value,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		Update_datetime = Relation_Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		insert_update_flag,
		Version_Name = Relation_Version_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
UnionForDB select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Version_Name,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectOutput
ConditionalSplitBudgetOrCashflow@Budget alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==0),
	updateIf(record_deleted_flag==1)) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdate
SelectOutput split(Budget_Type=='Budget',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitBudgetOrCashflow@(Budget, CashFlow)
AlterRowInsertUpdate sink(input(
		Budget_ID as long,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Version_Name as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Type as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Fund_ID','Asset_ID','GL_Code','Budget_Date','Budget_Type','Version_Name'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Version_Name,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Type,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> InsertUpdateRecords
